Package com.optimizely.ab.android.datafile_handler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatafileHandler
    DatafileHandler class that is used to interact with the datafile_handler module.
    DatafileLoadedListener
    Listens for new Optimizely datafiles Datafiles can come from a local file or the CDN
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatafileCache
    Abstracts the actual datafile to a cached file containing the JSONObject as a string.
    DatafileClient
    Makes requests to the Optly CDN to get the datafile
    DatafileLoader
    Handles intents and bindings in DatafileService
    DatafileRescheduler
    Broadcast Receiver that handles app upgrade and phone restart broadcasts in order to reschedule DatafileService In order to use this class you must include the declaration in your AndroidManifest.xml.
    DatafileService
    Service that handles loading the datafile from cache or downloads it from the CDN These services will only be used if you are using our DefaultDatafileHandler.
    DatafileServiceConnection
    The DatafileServiceConnection is used to bind to a DatafileService.
    DefaultDatafileHandler
    The default implementation of DatafileHandler and the main interaction point to the datafile-handler module.
